channel.title: Two Problems
channel.description:
Me and my friend are bringing back Near Reality, and we already have all the customs and shops, w.E But we have a problem with the dragon boots and random error in the client
The dragon boots are in the weapon slot
The error in the client: [code] java.lang.NullPointerException [/code]
THANKS SO MUCH!

item.title: Two Problems
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Thrown when an application attempts to use null in a case where an object is required. These include: Calling the instance method of a null object. Accessing or modifying the field of a null object. Taking the length of null as if it were an array. Accessing or modifying the slots of null as if it were an array. Throwing null as if it were a Throwable value.

Read full topic

item.title: Two Problems
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

ohokay:

[quote]Me and my friend are bringing back Near Reality

No you’re not.

If you don’t know how to make the boots go into the ‘boots’ slot, then please don’t attempt a remake.

Add the boots to your item.cfg, if that doesn’t work, you’ll need to check your Item.java

As for the nullpointer, it could be anything. You need to provide more information.[/quote]
totally agree… To change where it wields the item that would be in itemassistant.java not item.java

Read full topic

item.title: Two Problems
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Me and my friend are bringing back Near Reality

No you’re not.

If you don’t know how to make the boots go into the ‘boots’ slot, then please don’t attempt a remake.

Add the boots to your item.cfg, if that doesn’t work, you’ll need to check your Item.java

As for the nullpointer, it could be anything. You need to provide more information.

Read full topic
